name: Pummel Em' Down In The Baby Town
name_original: Pummel Em' Down In The Baby Town
description:
As Satan himself, take control of an ambulance and spread menace and misery throughout the city. running over people and crashing on cars.

made for BYOG 2022

Music by Shrinit @musicbyaxis

Satan's art/animation by Anurag @sadass_satan

everything else by me
